channel.title: Indoor Skydiving on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Indoor Skydiving on Martin's Blog

item.title: Bodyflight Bedford indoor skydiving [or how to fly around a room and not having a hangover the next day]
item.description: Bodyflight Bedford in 2007 It was a great day probably more suitable for outdoor skydiving than indoor skydiving. I set of from home early Saturday morning and arrived at Bedford five and a half hours later after stupidly ignoring my satnav and adding another hour to my already long journey. The Bodyflight facility is situated in a generally abandoned ex-military complex outside of Bedford near the A6. I heard it was used to do tests for the Concorde.
